Title: Spindle Motor Overheating
Description: Main spindle temperature exceeding safe operating limits (95°C vs 65°C normal). Abnormal vibration patterns detected at 8.2 Hz.

Title: Bearing Assembly Degradation
Description: Increased vibration and temperature in bearing assembly. Temperature at 72°C with 5.1 Hz vibration frequency.

Title: Hydraulic System Pressure Drop
Description: Main cylinder showing pressure fluctuation between 185-195 bar (normal 200 bar). Possible seal wear.

Title: Tool Changer Malfunction
Description: Pneumatic tool changer experiencing intermittent failures. Tools not fully seating in spindle.

Title: Robot Arm Joint Overheating
Description: J2 shoulder joint motor temperature increased to 85°C. Normal operating temp is 60°C.

Title: Compressor Oil Level Low
Description: Compressor Unit 1 showing low oil level warning. Oil consumption higher than normal.

Title: EDM Dielectric Pump Issue
Description: Dielectric circulation pump showing reduced flow rate. Flow at 16 L/min vs 20 L/min normal.

Title: Press Brake Back Gauge Drift
Description: R-axis servo motor encoder showing drift. Angle positioning accuracy degraded by 0.5°.

Title: Lathe Sub-Spindle Misalignment
Description: Sub-spindle alignment issue causing part transfer problems. Runout measured at 0.15mm.

Title: 5-Axis Table Backlash
Description: B-axis rotary table showing backlash of 0.08°. Affecting part accuracy.

Title: Robot Wrist Motor Failure
Description: M5 wrist motor bearing failure detected. Abnormal noise and vibration present.

Title: Chip Conveyor Jam
Description: Main chip conveyor system jammed with chips. Manual clearing required.

Title: Coolant System Contamination
Description: Coolant showing signs of contamination. pH at 8.5 vs 9.2 normal. Bacterial growth suspected.

Title: Servo Drive Communication Error
Description: X-axis servo drive intermittent communication errors with PLC. 3 faults in past week.

Title: Hydraulic Filtration Overdue
Description: Oil filtration system filter pressure differential at 4.5 bar. Service recommended at 4 bar.

Title: Vision System Calibration Drift
Description: Cognex vision system showing calibration drift. Part recognition accuracy at 92% vs 98% normal.

Title: Turret Indexing Delay
Description: Tool turret indexing time increased from 1.2s to 2.8s. Stepper motor performance degraded.

Title: Pneumatic Gripper Leak
Description: Assembly robot gripper showing air pressure leak. Grip force reduced to 85% normal.

Title: Chiller Condenser Fan Noise
Description: Unusual bearing noise from condenser fan motor. Vibration increased.

Title: EDM Spark Generator Fault
Description: Power supply showing voltage fluctuation. Spark stability affected.
